Welcome to jmyrStudio

Dec 10, 2017 â€¢ Kyung-Dong Lee

I am a Korean who is living in the Dist.7, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam and working as a freelance software developer. I am able to join a project requires a full stack developer who is experienced in developing from desktop (based on Win32) to web (Front/Backend) and mobile (iOS/Android) applications.

I have worked for several companies developing security products for Windows Server OS and mobile document solutions (like PDF) in Korea and made big contributions as a chief developer.

About a previous job, I was a chief software developer of oversea business department to set up joint venture company developing mobile services to apply the mobile document solutions in USA/China/Taiwan with a Venture Capital Bank in USA. Also I have consulted and developed integration solutions between the products above and legacy system on a customer side for Top IT enterprise companies in Korea.
